text_1_facilitator.eng:
Want to help your child develop and grow?

Invite your child to play with you today. Encourage them to ask questions and explore new things through play.

rows.media_title: How it helped a parent like you:
rows.media_transcript:
I thought that my daughter only started learning when she went to school. 

@global.app_name gave me lots of ideas for what I could do to help her learn and develop at home, too. We started by playing word games together, and were able to practise many words in a fun way. She is speaking much more now, and we are closer because of the time we spend together.
rows.text_1_facilitator:

Invite your child to play with you today. Encourage them to ask questions and explore new things through play.
